mapper.insert: insert into tbl_coachclass(num, title, intro, type, goal, tool, frequency, price) values(seq_coachclass.nextval, #{title}, #{intro}, #{type}, #{goal}, #{tool}, #{frequency}, #{price})
mapper.update: update tbl_coachclass set title=#{title}, intro=#{intro}, type=#{type}, goal=#{goal}, tool=#{tool}, frequency=#{frequency}, price=#{price} where num=#{num}
